body: For two sound sources heard simultaneously, one of which vibrates at 50 hertz and the other vibrates at 60 hertz, what is the beat frequency in beats per second?

As understood by the Greek astronomer Aristarchus, horizontal parallax is to shifts of a viewer's position on different points of the Earth, as annual parallax is to shifts of a viewer's position:

choices.W: as the earth moves around the sun
choices.X: as the moon moves through the lunar year
choices.Y: as the sun moves around the earth
choices.Z: as the celestial sphere moves about the earth

answer: W) AS THE EARTH MOVES AROUND THE SUN

body: The sine of theta is negative if the angle terminates in what two Quadrants of the Cartesian coordinate system?

choices.X: the refractive index for air is lower than glass
choices.Y: optical devices take advantage of it to improve resolution
choices.Z: the refractive index for oil is lower than air

answer: Z) THE REFRACTIVE INDEX FOR OIL IS LOWER THAN AIR

choices.Z: theoretical aspects of personality such as free will
